actions.description: List of actions that this statement either allows or denies. For example, `["ec2:RunInstances", "s3:*"]`.

conditions.description: Configuration block for a condition. Detailed below.

effect.description: Whether this statement allows or denies the given actions. Valid values are `Allow` and `Deny`. Defaults to `Allow`.

notActions.description: List of actions that this statement does *not* apply to. Use to apply a policy statement to all actions *except* those listed.

notPrincipals.description: Like `principals` except these are principals that the statement does *not* apply to.

notResources.description: List of resource ARNs that this statement does *not* apply to. Use to apply a policy statement to all resources *except* those listed. Conflicts with `resources`.

principals.description: Configuration block for principals. Detailed below.

resources.description: List of resource ARNs that this statement applies to. This is required by AWS if used for an IAM policy. Conflicts with `not_resources`.

sid.description: Sid (statement ID) is an identifier for a policy statement.
